OOC: Will you be stepping down from the Council altogether, or just from the lead of the Council/owner of NBW? Sorry, I'm just asking so I know if we need to have an election to fill a spot or not.

Rudra656@... wrote:OOC: Alright, some of you already know this, and it's time everyone knew.  (I think I told everyone on the council... if not... oops)  I'm not sure who's noticed but the site hasn't been updated in... er months.  This is not just because I'm lazy (I am but it's not important.) it's also because someone changed the password to edit the site.  Now, short of someone finding Yanshosh and beating a new password out of him that site is dead.

       On to further business.  Airly has offered to help develop a new site as long as other members help with the development and upkeep.  I do not have the time right now to help in any significant way (AP tests and end of year stuff, etc.) so we need volunteers.

       Now for my final piece of business.  I've thought long and hard about this... At the end of June I'm going to step down from ownership of the list...  I'll be gone through most of July and between work in the summer and starting college in the fall... I don't have the time to give that this group deserves.  I don't intend to leave the group as the past owners have but I will need to step back my involvement a bit.  I haven't yet decided who will replace me... I have a few ideas but I need to check with them first.  I wasn't planning on announcing it this soon but I thought giving the group time to prepare for the change would be better than me just fading out.

       Alright I'm sorry I was so longwinded today.  Back to your game. 
Yahoo! Groups Sponsor
